name: Magnifistorming Stanza Tribute
text:
Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of "Magnifistorming Stanza Tribute" once per turn);
● Add 1 Level 4 or lower "Magnifistorm" monster from your Deck to your hand.
● Add 1 "Mystical Space Typhoon" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
If this card is destroyed by the effect of "Mystical Space Typhoon": You can Set this card.
